Design-01.Description: Design Style 01 is a Solid stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe allowing the vehicle surface to show through, or it can be an alternate color than the main stripe.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02 is a Solid stripe with outer pinstripes. The outer pinstripe accents (red in image) can be the same, or alternate color to the main stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe, or it can be an alternate color than the main stripe.

Design-03.Description: Design Style 03 is a Solid stripe with outer pinstripes and a pinstriped circular section where custom text or logo can be added. The outer pinstripe and circular pinstripe accents (red in image) can be the same, or different colors than the main stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either be the same color as the main stripe, accent stripes, or it can be an alternate color both.
